comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Science, Technology, History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 38882663@N08
comment._content: No, it is  Vickers 1912 - the slightly improved British version of original Maxim gun. Russians, Germans and Britans had their own improved versions of the same Maxim MG in the WW1
